mil7.2.4:0.1_0: The Simile of the Making Hand
mil7.2.4:0.2_0: The account of the fault-finding mind
mil7.2.4:1.1_0: “A is you able to take one part in the forest?”
mil7.2.4:1.2_0: “Great king, in what way a mule-bearing, or else it’s womb.
mil7.2.4:1.3_0: In the same way, a layman who comes from the future, ties of the diseases, boils, chains, or blurst on conception in the future. In the same way, I will not be close to rebirth, old age, and death.
mil7.2.4:1.5_0: When the Buddha spoke like this, gods were told by the Buddha,
mil7.2.4:2.1_0: ‘I’ve cut the bonds of the lay followers,
mil7.2.4:2.2_0: like an elephant bursts a vine,
mil7.2.4:2.3_0: I’m not pregnant for the sake of a womb;
mil7.2.4:2.4_0: so rain, sky, if you wish.
